review: i am finally getting round to playing it playing through in memory of my late father who loved indiana jones compared to my history with the old games which lets face it were bad this one is excellent i am really getting into it only reason i stopped playing atm was to see if i could get the dlc without the premium upgrade pack i want the full story highly recommend it even if you are not a franchise fan it is still a great game in itself

review: amazing game   graphically it pushes the limits where some scenes look photorealistic if you have a decent graphics card  story and feel it is like you are playing a new indiana jones movie  gameplay is a bit slow and clunky it could definitely be improved  my biggest critiques are the slow clunky gameplay and the third act which really rushes the ending of the game otherwise this is a fantastic game that id recommend to anyone

review: really enjoying this game so farwould have made a great indiana jones movie the voice acting is great the story is just crazy enough but not too crazy the stealth and combat is fun and relatively forgiving even the platforming is well donewith no need to throw your controller through the window in frustration lastly the puzzles are relatively intuitive and theres always google if you cant figure them out

review: indiana jones and the great circle is best seen as a nostalgic cinematic ride  one that respects the character and franchise but doesnt push the envelope in terms of gameplay if youre a fan of indy or you enjoy storyrich adventure games its absolutely worth playing but if youre looking for cuttingedge mechanics or deep replayability you may find yourself wishing for more
